thai: sà-wàt-dii khâ. baaw-rí-sàt nam tuua thai-laaend. yin-dii ráp-chái khâ.
english: Hello. This is Nam Tour Thailand. May I help you?

thai: sà-wàt-dii khâ. phîi yàak bpai thîiao thaang nǔuea nâ khâ. chûuang-níi mii à-rai thîi nâa-sǒn-jai mǎi khá.
english: Hello. I want to go on a trip up north. Is there anything that is interesting at this time?

thai: bplaai duuean phrúet-sà-jì-gaa-yon jà mii ngaan yîi-bpeng thîi chiiang-mài khâ. sûeng jà jàt phráawm gan gàp ngaan laawy-grà-thong looei ná khá.
english: At the end of November, there is the Yee Peng festival in Chiang Mai, which will be arranged together with the Loi Krathong festival.
What is the Yee Peng festival?

thai: bpen ngaan yàai sûeng jà mii khoom-laawy lǎai phan lûuk. sǔuai mâak nâ khâ.
english: It's a big festival in which there are many thousands of floating lanterns. It's very beautiful.
during this time, at this period
(classifier for anything small and round shaped)
